title: CollectionItem
description: A single item in a user collection. Maps collection to content item.

id.description: The unique identifier for the collection item. Format: <col_id_s>|<ci_id_s>

ci_id_s.description: The unique identifier for the content item. Located in the main or text reuse passages index.

col_id_s.description: The unique identifier for the collection. Format: <user_id>_<collection_id>

vis_s.description: The visibility status of the collection item. `pub` for public, `pri` for private
